mapper.select: select r.*, m.nickname from review r join member m on m.member_id = r.member_id where r.product_id =#{product_id} order by review_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into review (review_id, product_id, member_id, comments, review_date, update_date , image_url) values (#{review_id}, #{product_id}, #{member_id}, #{comments}, sysdate, sysdate , #{image_url})
